You plan to visit 5 European cities for 21 days in total. You only take direct flights to commute between cities. You plan to stay in Berlin for 3 days. You want to meet a friend in Berlin between day 15 and day 17. You want to spend 5 days in Salzburg. You want to spend 7 days in Brussels. During day 6 and day 12, you have to attend a conference in Brussels. You want to spend 4 days in Frankfurt. You want to spend 6 days in Manchester.

Here are the cities that have direct flights:
Manchester and Berlin, Berlin and Salzburg, Frankfurt and Salzburg, Frankfurt and Berlin, Brussels and Berlin, from Brussels to Frankfurt, Manchester and Brussels, Manchester and Frankfurt.

Find a trip plan of visiting the cities for 21 days by taking direct flights to commute between them.
